member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.OnSizeChanged
member.summary: Occurs when property on the node has changed that influences the size of the node.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.OnImageChanged
member.summary: Occurs when any image property for the cell has changed.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.OnChildNodesSizeChanged
member.summary: Occurs when size of the child nodes has changed.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.OnExpandChanging(System.Boolean,DevComponents.AdvTree.eTreeAction)
member.summary: Called before Expanded state of the node has changed.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.OnDisplayChanged
member.summary: Called when visual part of the node has changed due to the changes of its properties or properties of the cells contained by node.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.OnChildNodeInserted(DevComponents.AdvTree.Node)
member.summary: Called after new node has been added to Nodes collection.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.OnChildNodeRemoved(DevComponents.AdvTree.Node)
member.summary: Called after node has been removed from Nodes collection.
member.param: Reference to the node that is removed.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.CreateCells
member.summary: Creates new cells based on the columns defined on either parent node or the columns in tree control. Node must be parented so it can get reference to a parent tree control.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.RaiseClick
member.summary: Raises the Click event on node and parent tree if available.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.CompareTo(System.Object)
member.summary: Provides implementation for IComparable interface. This is used for sorting and it compares the Text property on nodes.

member.name: E:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.NodeMouseDown
member.summary: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the node and a mouse button is pressed.

member.name: E:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.NodeMouseUp
member.summary: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the node and a mouse button is released.

member.name: E:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.NodeMouseMove
member.summary: Occurs when the mouse pointer is moved over the node.

member.name: E:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.NodeMouseEnter
member.summary: Occurs when the mouse enters the node.

member.name: E:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.NodeMouseLeave
member.summary: Occurs when the mouse leaves the node.

member.name: E:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.NodeMouseHover
member.summary: Occurs when the mouse hovers over the node.

member.name: E:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.NodeClick
member.summary: Occurs when the node is clicked with left mouse button. If you need to know more information like if another mouse button is clicked etc. use NodeMouseDown event.

member.name: E:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.NodeDoubleClick
member.summary: Occurs when the node is double-clicked.

member.name: E:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.MarkupLinkClick
member.summary: Occurs when hyperlink in text-markup is clicked.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.HasChildNodes
member.summary: Gets whether node has child nodes.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.ContextMenu
member.summary: Gets or sets the context menu assigned to this node. Standard Context Menus, VS.NET 2005 Context Menus and DotNetBar Suite context menus are supported. Default value is null (Nothing) which indicates that no context menu is assigned.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.HasHostedControls
member.summary: Gets whether any of the cells inside the node has HostedControl property set.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.NodeRenderer
member.summary: Gets or sets custom node renderer. You can set this property to your custom renderer. When set the RenderMode should be set to custom to enable your custom renderer. To choose one of the system renderer use RenderMode property. Default value is null.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.RenderMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the render mode used to render the node. Default value is eNodeRenderMode.Default which indicates that system default renderer is used. Note that if you specify custom renderer you need to set either AdvTree.NodeRenderer or Node.NodeRenderer property.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.Expanded
member.summary: Gets or sets whether node is expanded. Expanded node shows it's child nodes.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.Name
member.summary: Returns name of the node that can be used to identify it from the code.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.DragDropEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether node can be dragged and dropped. Default value is true.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.ExpandVisibility
member.summary: Gets or sets visibility of the expand button. Default value is Auto meaning that expand button is displayed only if node has at least one child node.
member.remarks: You can use this property for example to dynamically load the child nodes when user tries to expand the node. You could for example handle BeforeExpand event to load child nodes into the node.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.SizeChanged
member.summary: Gets or sets whether any operation on the node has been performed that would affect node's size. Size changed flag internally indicates that node's size needs to be recalculated because it has changed due to the changes in data.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.BoundsRelative
member.summary: Gets the relative bounds of the tree node including the expand part of the node.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.Bounds
member.summary: Gets the absolute bounds of the tree node including the expand part of the node.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.ContentBounds
member.summary: Gets the node content bounds.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.CellsBoundsRelative
member.summary: Gets the bounds for all the cells inside the node. The bounds do not include the expand part.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.CellsBounds
member.summary: Gets the bounds for all the cells inside the node. The bounds do not include the expand part.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.ChildNodesBounds
member.summary: Gets or sets the bounds of child nodes.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.ExpandPartRectangleRelative
member.summary: Gets the expand part rectangle. Expand part is used to expand/collapse node.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.ExpandPartRectangle
member.summary: Gets the expand part rectangle. Expand part is used to expand/collapse node.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.ExpandPartVerticalAlignment
member.summary: Indicates vertical alignment within the node bounds of expand part of the node, if one is visible.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.CommandBounds
member.summary: Gets or sets the Command part bounds if command part is visible.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.Checked
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tree node is in a checked state.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.CheckBoxAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the checkbox alignment in relation to the text displayed by first default cell.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.CheckBoxVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets whether check box is visible inside the cell.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.CheckBoxStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the appearance style of the item. Default value is CheckBox. Item can also assume the style of radio-button.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.CheckBoxThreeState
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the CheckBox will allow three check states rather than two. If the ThreeState property is set to true CheckState property should be used instead of Checked property to set the extended state of the control.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.CheckState
member.summary: Specifies the state of a control, such as a check box, that can be checked, unchecked, or set to an indeterminate state.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.Editable
member.summary: Gets or sets whether first cell content is editable when cell editing is enabled on tree control. Default value is true.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.FullPath
member.summary: Gets the path from the root tree node to the current tree node. The path consists of the labels of all the tree nodes that must be navigated to get to this tree node, starting at the root tree node. The node labels are separated by the delimiter character specified in the PathSeparator property of the Tree control that contains this node.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.Index
member.summary: Gets the zero based index of position of the tree node in the tree node collection. -1 is returned if node is not parented. If node is root node the index of node in AdvTree.Nodes collection is returned.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.IsEditing
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the tree node is in an editable state. true if the tree node is in editable state; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.IsMouseDown
member.summary: Gets whether left mouse button is pressed on any cell contained by this node.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.IsMouseOver
member.summary: Gets whether mouse cursor is over on any cell contained by this node.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.IsSelected
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the tree node is in the selected state. true if the tree node is in the selected state; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.Selectable
member.summary: Gets or sets whether node can be selected by user by clicking it with the mouse or using keyboard. Default value is true.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.CanSelect
member.summary: Gets whether node can be selected. Node must be Visible, Enabled and Selectable in order for it to be selected.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.SelectedCell
member.summary: Gets or sets a cell that is in selected state otherwise it returns null.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.IsVisible
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the tree node is visible. Node is considered to be visible when it's Visible property is set to true and path to the node is available i.e. all parent nodes are expanded.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.IsDisplayed
member.summary: Returns whether node is displayed on the screen and visible to the user. When node is outside of the viewable area this property will return false. It will also return false if node is not visible.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.LastNode
member.summary: Gets the last child tree node. The LastNode is the last child Node in the NodeCollection stored in the Nodes property of the current tree node. If the Node has no child tree node, the LastNode property returns a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.NextNode
member.summary: Gets the next sibling tree node. The NextNode is the next sibling Node in the NodeCollection stored in the Nodes property of the tree node's parent Node. If there is no next tree node, the NextNode property returns a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.NextVisibleNode
member.summary: Gets the next visible tree node. The NextVisibleNode can be a child, sibling, or a tree node from another branch. If there is no next tree node, the NextVisibleNode property returns a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.Level
member.summary: Gets the zero-based depth of the tree node in the tree control. The root node is considered the first level of nesting and returns 0.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.Nodes
member.summary: Gets the collection of Node objects assigned to the current tree node. The Nodes property can hold a collection of other Node objects. Each of the tree node in the collection has a Nodes property that can contain its own NodeCollection. Nesting of tree nodes can make it difficult to navigate a tree structure. The FullPath property makes it easier to determine your location in a tree.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.AnyVisibleNodes
member.summary: Gets whether there is at least one child node that has its Visible property set to true.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.Parent
member.summary: Gets the parent tree node of the current tree node. If the tree node is at the root level, the Parent property returns a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.PrevNode
member.summary: Gets the previous sibling tree node. The PrevNode is the previous sibling Node in the NodeCollection stored in the Nodes property of the tree node's parent Node. If there is no previous tree node, the PrevNode property returns a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.PrevVisibleNode
member.summary: Gets the previous visible tree node. The PrevVisibleNode can be a child, sibling, or a tree node from another branch. If there is no previous tree node, the PrevVisibleNode property returns a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.Tag
member.summary: Gets or sets the object that contains data about the tree node. Any Object derived type can be assigned to this property. If this property is being set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.TagString
member.summary: Gets or sets the object that contains data about the tree node. Any Object derived type can be assigned to this property. If this property is being set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.BindingIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the Binding index in CurrencyManager list if node is bound. You should not change this value directly since it is used internally by the control for data binding scenarios.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.DataKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the object that contains additional data about the tree node. Any Object derived type can be assigned to this property. If this property is being set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned. This property has same function as Tag property and provides you with additional separate storage of data.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.DataKeyString
member.summary: Gets or sets the object that contains additional data about the tree node. Any Object derived type can be assigned to this property. If this property is being set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned. This property has same function as Tag property and provides you with additional separate storage of data.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.TextDisplayFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format that is applied to the value of Text property for display purposes (applies to first cell in a node, i.e. Cells[0]). See "Formatting Overview" in MSDN for description on available format strings. For example you can specify "C" to format text as currency, or "D" to format text as decimal number etc.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed in the tree node.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.HostedControl
member.summary: Gets or sets the control hosted inside of the first node cell.

remarks.para: When control is hosted inside of the cell, cell size is determined by the size of the control hosted inside of it. The cell will not display its text but it will display any image assigned or check box when control is hosted inside of it. The Style settings like Margin and Padding will still apply.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.HostedItem
member.summary: Gets or sets the item hosted inside of the first cell. Only items that do not generate popups are supported. Note that cell can only host either HostedItem or HostedControl but not both.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.TreeControl
member.summary: Gets the parent tree control that the tree node is assigned to.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.CellLayout
member.summary: Gets or sets the layout of the cells inside the node. Default value is Horizontal layout which means that cell are positioned horizontally next to each other.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.VerticalCellLayoutAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the cell alignment when CellLayout=Vertical. Default value is center which means that cells are center aligned.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.CellPartLayout
member.summary: Gets or sets the layout of the cell parts like check box, image and text. Layout can be horizontal (default) where parts of the cell are positioned next to each other horizontally, or vertical where parts of the cell are positioned on top of each other vertically. Alignment of the each part is controlled by alignment properties. This property affects only the first cell inside of the node. Use Cell.Layout property to change the part layout on each cell contained by node.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.Tooltip
member.summary: Gets/Sets informational text (tooltip) for the cell.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.Cells
member.summary: Gets the collection of all Cells assigned to this node. There should be always at least one cell in a node which is default cell. Default collection contains a single cell.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.NodesColumnsHeaderVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets whether column header for child nodes if defined is visible. Default value is true.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.HasColumns
member.summary: Gets whether node has child nodes columns defined.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.NodesColumns
member.summary: Get collection of child node columns.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.StyleExpanded
member.summary: Gets or sets the style of the cells when node is expanded.
member.value: Reference to the style assigned to the node/cell or null value indicating that default style setting from tree control is applied. Default value is null.

remarks.para: When node is expanded the style specified here will be used on all cells associated with this node instead of the Cell.StyleNormal. That way you can give different appearance to your node's cells when node is expanded.
When property is set to null value the style setting from parent tree controls is used. NodeStyleExpanded on AdvTree control is a root style for a cell.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.StyleExpandedName
member.summary: Gets or sets the expanded style name used by node. This member is provided for internal use only. To set or get the style use StyleExpanded property instead.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.StyleSelected
member.summary: Gets or sets the style used when Node is selected. Default value is NULL (VB Nothing)

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.StyleSelectedName
member.summary: Gets or sets the selected style name used by node. This member is provided for internal use only. To set or get the style use StyleSelected property instead.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.StyleMouseOver
member.summary: Gets or sets the style used when mouse is over the Node. Default value is NULL (VB Nothing)

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.StyleMouseOverName
member.summary: Gets or sets the mouse over style name used by node. This member is provided for internal use only. To set or get the style use StyleMouseOver property instead.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.Style
member.summary: Gets or sets the node style.
member.value: Reference to the style assigned to the node or null value indicating that default style setting from tree control is applied. Default value is null.

remarks.para: Style specified by this property will be used as default style for the node. Each cell within the node can also specify it's own style. Since node contains the cells using this style property can you for example create a border around all cell contained by the node.
When this property is set to null value (default value) NodeStyle property on AdvTree control is used.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.StyleName
member.summary: Gets or sets the style name used by node. This member is provided for internal use only. To set or get the style use Style property instead.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.MouseOverNodePart
member.summary: Gets or sets the part of the node mouse is over.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.Offset
member.summary: Gets or sets the node horizontal offset from the position determined by the layout manager.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.ImageAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the image alignment in relation to the text displayed by cell. This property affects only first default cell inside the node. Property with same name is available on each cell and you can use it to affect each cell individually.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether node is enabled. Default value is true. Setting this value to false will set Enabled=false on all child cells.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.ImageDisabled
member.summary: Gets or sets the image displayed when the tree node is disabled. If image is not specified control will create gray-scale disabled image automatically.
member.remarks: Image specified will be used as image when node is disabled.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.ImageDisabledIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the image-list index value of the disabled image.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.Image
member.summary: Gets or sets the image displayed when the tree node is in the unselected state.
member.remarks: Image specified will be used as a default image for any other node state where different image is not specified.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.ImageKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the image-list key value of the default image that is displayed by the tree nodes.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.ImageIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the image-list index value of the default image that is displayed by the tree nodes.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.ImageMouseOver
member.summary: Gets or sets the image displayed when mouse is over the tree node.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.ImageMouseOverIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the image-list index value of the image that is displayed by the tree nodes when mouse is over the node.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.ImageMouseOverKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the image-list key value of the image that is displayed by the tree nodes when mouse is over the node.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.ImageExpanded
member.summary: Gets or sets the image displayed when node is expanded.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.ImageExpandedIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the image-list index value of the image that is displayed by the tree nodes when node is expanded.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.ImageExpandedKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the image-list key value of the image that is displayed by the tree nodes when node is expanded.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.ImageList
member.summary: Property Editor support for ImageIndex selection

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.ParentConnector
member.summary: Gets or sets the NodeConnector object that describes the type of the connector used for displaying connection between current node and its parent node. Default value is null which means that settings from AdvTree control are used.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.Visible
member.summary: Gets or sets whether node is visible.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.CommandButton
member.summary: Gets or sets whether command button is visible. Default value is false. Command button can be used to display for example popup menu with commands for node, or to display the list of linked nodes.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.SelectedConnectorMarker
member.summary: Gets or sets internal value that indicates that node is on "path" of the selected node.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.IsSelectionVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets whether node selection is visible in UI when node is selected. Default value is true. You can set this value to false to temporary disable the display of selection for a node.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.NodesIndent
member.summary: Gets or sets the additional indent for the child nodes that is added to the AdvTree.Indent value when performing child node layout. Default value i 0.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.CellNavigationEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether Left/Right navigation through the cells when SingleCellSelection on tree is set is enabled. Default value is true.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.FullRowBackground
member.summary: Gets or sets whether style background that is applied to the node is drawn across the width of the tree control instead of only behind the node content. Default value is false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.ColumnHeaderHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the child column header height.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.AccessibleObject
member.summary: Gets the AccessibleObject assigned to the item.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription
member.summary: Gets or sets the default action description of the control for use by accessibility client applications.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.AccessibleDescription
member.summary: Gets or sets the description of the control used by accessibility client applications.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.AccessibleName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the control used by accessibility client applications.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.AccessibleRole
member.summary: Gets or sets the accessible role of the item.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.Node.IsAccessible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the node is visible to accessibility applications.

member.name: T:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeCollection
member.summary: Represents collection for Node objects.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeCollection.SetParentNode(DevComponents.AdvTree.Node)
member.summary: Sets the node collection belongs to.
member.param: Node that is parent of this collection.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeCollection.Add(DevComponents.AdvTree.Node)
member.summary: Adds new object to the collection.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeCollection.Add(DevComponents.AdvTree.Node,DevComponents.AdvTree.eTreeAction)

member.summary: Adds an array of objects to the collection.

member.summary: Inserts new object into the collection.
member.param: Action that is causing the event

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeCollection.IndexOf(DevComponents.AdvTree.Node)
member.summary: Returns index of the object inside of the collection.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeCollection.Contains(DevComponents.AdvTree.Node)
member.summary: Returns whether collection contains specified object.
member.returns: true if object is part of the collection, otherwise false.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeCollection.Remove(DevComponents.AdvTree.Node)

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeCollection.CopyTo(DevComponents.AdvTree.Node[])
member.summary: Copies contained items to the Node array.

member.summary: Sorts the elements in the entire collection using the IComparable implementation of each element.

member.summary: Sorts the elements in the entire collection using the specified comparer.
member.param: The IComparer implementation to use when comparing elements.-or- null to use the IComparable implementation of each element.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeCollection.Sort(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Collections.IComparer)
member.summary: Sorts the elements in a range of elements in collection using the specified comparer.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeCollection.Find(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Finds the tree nodes with specified key, optionally searching sub-nodes.
member.param: The name of the tree node to search for.
true to search child nodes of tree nodes; otherwise, false.
member.returns: An array of Node objects whose Name property matches the specified key.

member.summary: Gets or sets the node this collection is associated with.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeCollection.Item(System.Int32)

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeComparer.#ctor
member.summary: Creates new instance of NodeComparer class. You can use NodeComparer to sort the nodes by specific column/cell by calling NodeCollection.Sort method and pass new instance of NodeComparer class.

member.summary: Creates new instance of NodeComparer class. You can use NodeComparer to sort the nodes by specific column/cell by calling NodeCollection.Sort method and pass new instance of NodeComparer class.
member.param: Column/Cell index to use for sorting.

member.name: P:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeComparer.ColumnIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the Column/Cell index that is used for sorting.

member.summary: Creates new instance of NodeComparer class. You can use NodeComparer to sort the nodes by specific column/cell by calling NodeCollection.Sort method and pass new instance of NodeComparer class.
member.param: Column/Cell index to use for sorting.

member.name: T:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeFlatIndexComparer
member.summary: Sort by flat node index.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeOperations.GetLastNode(DevComponents.AdvTree.Node)
member.summary: Gets the last child tree node. The LastNode is the last child Node in the NodeCollection stored in the Nodes property of the current tree node. If the Node has no child tree node, the LastNode property returns a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
member.returns: Last node if found or null if there is no last node.

member.summary: Returns last rendered node on screen.

member.summary: Returns first rendered node on screen.

member.summary: Gets last visible node in tree control.
member.returns: Last visible node found or null

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeOperations.GetLastVisibleTopLevelNode(DevComponents.AdvTree.AdvTree)
member.summary: Gets last visible top-level node in tree control.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeOperations.GetNextNode(DevComponents.AdvTree.Node)
member.summary: Gets the next sibling tree node. The NextNode is the next sibling Node in the NodeCollection stored in the Nodes property of the tree node's parent Node. If there is no next tree node, the NextNode property returns a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
member.returns: Node object or null if node cannot be found.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeOperations.GetNextVisibleSibling(DevComponents.AdvTree.Node)
member.summary: Returns next visible sibling tree node.
member.returns: Node object or null if next visible node cannot be found

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeOperations.GetNextVisibleNode(DevComponents.AdvTree.Node)
member.summary: Gets the next visible tree node. The NextVisibleNode can be a child, sibling, or a tree node from another branch. If there is no next tree node, the NextVisibleNode property returns a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
member.returns: Node object or null if node cannot be found.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeOperations.GetAnyNextNode(DevComponents.AdvTree.Node)
member.summary: Gets the next visible tree node. The NextVisibleNode can be a child, sibling, or a tree node from another branch. If there is no next tree node, the NextVisibleNode property returns a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
member.returns: Node object or null if node cannot be found.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeOperations.GetIsNodeVisible(DevComponents.AdvTree.Node)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the tree node is visible. Node is considered to be visible when it's Visible property is set to true and path to the node is available i.e. all parent nodes are expanded.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeOperations.GetIsNodeDisplayed(DevComponents.AdvTree.Node)
member.summary: Returns whether node is displayed on the screen and visible to the user. When node is outside of the viewable area this property will return false. It will also return false if node is not visible.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeOperations.GetNodeIndex(DevComponents.AdvTree.Node)

member.returns: Node object or null if node cannot be found.

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeOperations.GetPreviousVisibleNode(DevComponents.AdvTree.Node)

member.name: M:DevComponents.AdvTree.NodeOperations.GetAnyPreviousNode(DevComponents.AdvTree.Node)

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.BalloonTip.BalloonControl
member.summary: Gets or sets the internal Balloon control that is used to display Balloon. This property will have valid value only during time Balloon is actually displayed on the screen. Value will also be valid during BalloonDisplaying event. You can use this property to further customize Balloon control before it is displayed to the user. You can also set it to your own instance of the Balloon control (or the control that is inheriting it) for ultimate customization options. Note that new instance of Balloon control is created each time Balloon needs to be displayed. Once Balloon is closed control is disposed.

member.name: T:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ICustomSerialization
member.summary: Desribes interface that provides custom serialization support for items.

member.name: M:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ICustomSerialization.InvokeSerializeItem(DevComponents.DotNetBar.SerializeItemEventArgs)
member.summary: Invokes SerializeItem event.

member.name: M:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ICustomSerialization.InvokeDeserializeItem(DevComponents.DotNetBar.SerializeItemEventArgs)
member.summary: Invokes DeserializeItem event.

member.name: E:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ICustomSerialization.SerializeItem
member.summary: Occurs after an item has been serialized to XmlElement and provides you with opportunity to add any custom data to serialized XML. This allows you to serialize any data with the item and load it back up in DeserializeItem event.

remarks.para: To serialize custom data to XML definition control creates handle this event and use CustomXmlElement property on SerializeItemEventArgs to add new nodes or set attributes with custom data you want saved.

member.name: E:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ICustomSerialization.DeserializeItem
member.summary: Occurs after an item has been de-serialized (load) from XmlElement and provides you with opportunity to load any custom data you have serialized during SerializeItem event.

remarks.para: To de-serialize custom data from XML definition handle this event and use CustomXmlElement property on SerializeItemEventArgs to retrive any data you saved in SerializeItem event.

member.name: E:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.DockTabClosing
member.summary: Occurs on dockable bars when end-user attempts to close the individual DockContainerItem objects using system buttons on dock tab. Event can be canceled by setting the Cancel property of event arguments to true. This even will occur only after user presses the X button on tab that is displaying the dockable windows/documents.

member.name: E:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.DockTabClosed
member.summary: Occurs on dockable bars after DockContainerItem is closed by end-user. This action cannot be cancelled.

member.name: E:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.SerializeItem
member.summary: Occurs after an item has been serialized to XmlElement and provides you with opportunity to add any custom data to serialized XML. This allows you to serialize any data with the item and load it back up in DeserializeItem event.

remarks.para: To serialize custom data to XML definition control creates handle this event and use CustomXmlElement property on SerializeItemEventArgs to add new nodes or set attributes with custom data you want saved.

member.name: E:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.DeserializeItem
member.summary: Occurs after an item has been de-serialized (load) from XmlElement and provides you with opportunity to load any custom data you have serialized during SerializeItem event.

remarks.para: To de-serialize custom data from XML definition handle this event and use CustomXmlElement property on SerializeItemEventArgs to retrive any data you saved in SerializeItem event.

member.name: E:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.TabStripStyleChanged
member.summary: Occurs after the TabStrip style which used on dockable windows has changed. This event gives you opportunity to change the style of the tab strip by accessing Bar.DockTabControl.Style property.

member.name: E:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.PreRender
member.summary: Occurs before the bar control is rendered. This event is fired once for each part of the bar control being rendered. Check the Part property of the event arguments to identify the part being rendered. You can cancel internal rendering by setting Cancel property.

member.name: E:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.PostRender
member.summary: Occurs after the bar control is rendered and allows you to render on top of the default rendering provided by the control.

member.name: E:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.LocalizeString
member.summary: Occurs when DotNetBar is looking for translated text for one of the internal text that are displayed on menus, toolbars and customize forms. You need to set Handled=true if you want your custom text to be used instead of the built-in system value.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.Owner

member.summary: Gets or sets the item default accessibility action will be performed on.

member.summary: Returns the reference to the control that last had input focus. This property should be used to determine which control had input focus before bar gained the focus. Use it to apply the menu command to active control.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.BorderColors
member.summary: Indicates the array of colors that when set are used to draw the border of the item.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.RenderMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the redering mode used by control. Default value is eRenderMode.Global which means that static GlobalManager.Renderer is used. If set to Custom then Renderer property must also be set to the custom renderer that will be used.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.Renderer
member.summary: Gets or sets the custom renderer used by the items on this control. RenderMode property must also be set to eRenderMode.Custom in order renderer specified here to be used.

member.summary: Gets or sets the selected DockContainerItem if bar represents dockable window.

member.summary: Gets or sets the tab (DockContainerItem) index for Bars with LayoutType set to eLayoutType.DockContainer. Index corresponds to the index of the DockContainerItem in Bar.Items collection.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.BackgroundImage
member.summary: Indicates Bar background image.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.AutoCreateCaptionMenu
member.summary: Gets or sets whether caption button menu for bars with grab handle task pane is automatically created. Caption menu when automatically created will display the list of all items from Items collection and it will maintain only one item from the list as visible item. To create custom caption menu that is displayed when user clicks the caption button handle CaptionButtonClick event.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.AutoSyncBarCaption
member.summary: Gets or sets whether caption (text) of the bars with dock container layout is automatically set to the selected dock container item text.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.CanUndock
member.summary: Specifies whether Bar can be undocked. Does not apply to stand alone bars.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.CanTearOffTabs
member.summary: Specifes whether end-user can tear-off (deattach) the tabs on dockable window.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.CanReorderTabs
member.summary: Specifes whether end-user can reorder the tabs on dockable window.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.CanDockTab
member.summary: Gets or sets whether bar or DockContainerItem that is torn-off this bar can be docked as tab to another bar. Default value is true which indicates that bar can be docked as tab to another bar.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.CanMove
member.summary: Gets or sets whether dock bar can be moved by dragging its caption using the mouse.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.CanDockTop
member.summary: Specifies whether Bar can be docked on Top dock site or not. Does not apply to stand alone bars.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.CanDockBottom
member.summary: Specifies whether Bar can be docked on Bottom dock site or not. Does not apply to stand alone bars.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.CanDockLeft
member.summary: Specifes whether Bar can be docked on Left dock site or not. Does not apply to stand alone bars.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.CanDockRight
member.summary: Specifes whether Bar can be docked on Right dock site or not. Does not apply to stand alone bars.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.CanDockDocument
member.summary: Specifies whether Bar can be docked as document. Default value is false. See DotNetBarManager.EnableDocumentDocking for more details.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.Stretch
member.summary: Specifies whether Bar will stretch to always fill the space in dock site. Applies to the dockable bars only.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.DisabledImagesGrayScale
member.summary: Gets or sets whether gray-scale algorithm is used to create automatic gray-scale images. Default is true.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.DockOffset
member.summary: Gets/Sets the distance from the far left/top side of the docking site or suggests the order of the docked bar. Upon serialization this property will contain actual left/top position of the bar. You can use it to re-order the bars docked on the same line. Property value is relative to the other bars docked on the same line when it is used to change the order. For example setting DockOffset value to 10 will place the bar just after the last bar on the same line that has DockOffset value less than 10. If there is no bar with DockOffset value less than 10 the bar will be placed in first position.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.DockLine
member.summary: Gets/Sets the dock line.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.DockTabAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the dock tab alignment.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.CloseSingleTab
member.summary: Gets or sets whether selected dock tab is closed when Bar caption close button is pressed. Default value is false which indicates that whole bar will be hidden when bars close button is pressed.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.DockTabCloseButtonVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets whether close button is displayed on each dock tab that allows closing of the tab. Default value is false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.AlwaysDisplayDockTab
member.summary: Gets or sets whether tab that shows all dock containers on the bar is visible all the time. By default tab is hidden when there is only one item displayed.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.LockDockPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets whether bar is locked to prevent docking below it. Applies to undockable bars only.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.DockOrientation
member.summary: Gets/Sets the orientation of the Bar.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.Docked
member.summary: Returns whether Bar is docked or not.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.DockedSite
member.summary: Returns the Bars dock site.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.DockSide
member.summary: Gets/Sets the dock side for the Bar.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.InitalFloatLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the inital floating location. This location will be used when DockSide is set to None.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.ShowToolTips
member.summary: Indicates whether Tooltips are shown on Bars and menus.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.DesignerSelection
member.summary: Gets or sets whether control is selected in designer.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Bar.AlwaysDisplayKeyAccelerators
member.summary: Gets or sets whether accelerator letters for menu or toolbar commands are underlined regardless of current Windows settings. Accelerator keys allow easy access to menu commands by using Alt + choosen key (letter). Default value is false which indicates that system setting is used to determine whether accelerator letters are underlined. Setting this property to true will always display accelerator letter underlined.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.BarUtilities.FadeAnimatorEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether Fade Animation is enabled on system level for DotNetBar items which use this. Default value is true.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.BarUtilities.UseGenericDefaultStringFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets whether StringFormat internally used by all DotNetBar controls to render text is GenericDefault. Default value is false which indicates that GenericTypographic is used.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.BarUtilities.AntiAliasTextRenderingHint
member.summary: Gets or sets the anti-alias text rendering hint that will be used to render text on controls that have AntiAlias property set to true.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.BarUtilities.UseTextRenderer
member.summary: Gets or sets whether .NET Framework TextRenderer class is used for text rendering instead of Graphics.DrawString. Default value is false. Using TextRenderer will disable the Fade and Animation effects on controls because of issues in TextRenderer when drawing text on transparent surfaces.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.BarUtilities.AlwaysGenerateAccessibilityFocusEvent
member.summary: Gets or sets whether items always generate the Focus accessibility event when mouse enters the item. Default value is false which indicates that focus event will be raised only when item is on menu bar.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.BarUtilities.AutoRemoveMessageFilter
member.summary: Gets or sets whether Application Message Filter that is registered by popup controls is automatically unregistered when last control is disposed. Default value is false and in most cases should not be changed.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.BarUtilities.TextMarkupCultureSpecificPadding
member.summary: Get or sets the text-markup padding for text measurement when running on Japanese version of Windows.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.BarUtilities.DisposeItemImages
member.summary: Gets or sets whether Image and Icon resources assigned to items and controls are automatically disposed when control or item is disposed. Default value is false.

member.name: M:DevComponents.DotNetBar.BaseItem.Invoke(System.Delegate,System.Object[])
member.summary: Executes the specified delegate, on the thread that owns the control's underlying window handle, with the specified list of arguments. This property calls directly the ContainerControl.Invoke and is provided as shortcut convenience property only.
member.param: A delegate to a method that takes parameters of the same number and type that are contained in the args parameter.
An array of objects to pass as arguments to the specified method. This parameter can be null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if the method takes no arguments.
member.returns: An Object that contains the return value from the delegate being invoked, or nullNothingnullptra null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if the delegate has no return value.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.BaseItem.GlobalName
member.summary: Gets or sets the global name of the item that is used to synchronize the Global properties for the item across all instances with same global name. Note that only instances that belong to the same control are synchronized. GlobalItem must be set to true to perform the synchronization. You can find more information and list of properties that are synchronized in help file.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.BaseItem.ShouldSyncProperties
member.summary: Gets whether global properties should synchronized.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.BaseItem.SupportedOrientation
member.summary: Gets orientation within container that is supported by this item. If item does not support certain orientation the container automatically hides it when container switches into that orientation.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.BaseItem.GlobalItem
member.summary: Gets or sets whether item is global or not. This flag is used to propagate property changes to all items with the same name. Setting for example Visible property on the item that has GlobalItem set to true will set visible property to the same value on all items with the same name.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.BaseItem.Orientation
member.summary: Gets or sets orientation inside the container. Do not change the value of this property. It is managed by system only.

Use KeyTips property when you want to assign the one or more letters to be used to access an item. For example assigning the FN to KeyTips property will require the user to press F then N keys to select an item. Pressing the F letter will show only keytips for the items that start with letter F.

If the large images are not provided the regular button image will be automatically enlarged.

member.summary: Gets or sets the normal image size for the buttons, default value is 24 by 24 pixels. This should be set to the default image size that you will use on the buttons. If the images specified for the buttons are not of the same size as the size specified here then they will be automatically resized. Normal size must always be smaller than the size specified by ImageSizeLarge property.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether content blocks are resized to fit the container bound if they occupy less space than it is available by container. Default value is false.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether content blocks are resized (Width) to fit container bounds if they occupy less space than the actual container width. Applies to the Vertical orientation only. Default value is false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.UI.ContentManager.SerialContentLayoutManager.HorizontalFitContainerHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets whether content blocks are resized (Height) to fit container bounds if they occupy less space than the actual container height. Applies to the Horizontal orientation only. Default value is false.

member.summary: Gets or sets the content orientation. Default value is Horizontal.

member.summary: Gets or sets the block line vertical alignment. Default value is Middle.

member.summary: Gets or sets the content horizontal alignment. Default value is Left.

member.name: P:DevComponents.UI.ContentManager.SerialContentLayoutManager.EvenHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets whether all content blocks are resized so they have same height which is height of the tallest content block. Default value is false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.UI.ContentManager.SerialContentLayoutManager.OversizeDistribute
member.summary: Gets or sets whether oversized blocks are resized based on the percentage reduction instead of based on equal pixel distribution. Default value is false.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether content is wrapped into new line if it exceeds the width of the container.

member.summary: Creates the popup container control which is a parent/holder control for the controls you want to display on the popup. This method can be used if you do not wish to handle the PopupContainerLoad to add controls to the popup container. After calling this method you can access PopupContainerControl property to add your controls to be displayed on the popup.
member.param: Indicates whether PopupContainerLoad events are fired.

member.name: E:DevComponents.DotNetBar.PopupItem.PopupContainerLoad
member.summary: Occurs when popup container is loading. Use this event to assign control to the popup container. If you want to use same control that you added to the popup container after popup is closed you must handle the PopupContainerUnload event and remove the control from the popup container so it is not disposed with the container.

member.name: E:DevComponents.DotNetBar.PopupItem.PopupContainerUnload
member.summary: Occurs when popup container is unloading. Use this event to save any state associated with the control that was contained by the container or to remove the control from the container so it is not disposed with container.

member.summary: Specifies maximum of 2 character text displayed inside of the notification mark on top of the button.

member.summary: Indicates the position of the notification marker within the bounds of the button.

member.summary: Specifies diameter of notification mark. When set to 0 system default value is used.

member.summary: Gets or sets background color of the notification mark.

member.summary: Specifies the offset for the notification mark relative to its position.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.ImagePosition
member.summary: Gets/Sets the image position inside the button.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.CustomColorName
member.summary: Gets or sets the custom color name. Name specified here must be represented by the corresponding object with the same name that is part of the Office2007ColorTable.RibbonTabItemColors collection. See documentation for Office2007ColorTable.RibbonTabItemColors for more information. If color table with specified name cannot be found default color will be used. Valid settings for this property override any setting to the Color property. Applies to items with Office 2007 style only.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.ColorTable
member.summary: Gets or sets the predefined color of the button. Color specified applies to buttons with Office 2007 style only. It does not have any effect on other styles. Default value is eButtonColor.Default

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.ButtonStyle
member.summary: Gets/Sets the button style which controls the appearance of the button elements. Changing the property can display image only, text only or image and text on the button at all times.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.AutoExpandOnClick
member.summary: Indicates whether the item will auto-expand when clicked. When item is on top level bar and not on menu and contains sub-items, sub-items will be shown only if user click the expand part of the button. Setting this property to true will expand the button and show sub-items when user clicks anywhere inside of the button. Default value is false which indicates that button is expanded only if its expand part is clicked.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.SymbolColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the Symbol.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.SymbolRealized
member.summary: Gets the realized symbol string.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.Symbol
member.summary: Indicates the symbol displayed on face of the button instead of the image. Setting the symbol overrides the image setting.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.SymbolSet
member.summary: Gets or sets the symbol set used to represent the Symbol.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.SymbolSize
member.summary: Indicates the size of the symbol in points.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.Icon
member.summary: Specifies the Button icon. Icons support multiple image sizes and alpha blending.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.ImageAlt
member.summary: Specifies the Button image which is used when button background is black or very dark. Image is used when button text is white. This is provided for Metro style applications.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.Image
member.summary: Specifies the Button image.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.ImageSmall
member.summary: Specifies the small Button image used by Ribbon control when small image variant is needed because of the automatic button resizing or because the button is on the Quick Access Toolbar.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.ImageListSizeSelection
member.summary: Gets or sets the image size that is used by the button when multiple ImageList controls are used as source for button image. By default ImageList assigned to Images property of parent control is used. Using this property you can selection ImagesMedium or ImagesLarge ImageList to be used as source for image for this button.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.UseSmallImage
member.summary: Gets or sets whether button uses the ImageSmall as source of the image displayed on the button if ImageSmall is set to valid image. Default value is false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.ImageIndex
member.summary: Specifies the index of the image for the button if ImageList is used.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.HoverImage
member.summary: Specifies the image for the button when mouse is over the item.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.HoverImageIndex
member.summary: Specifies the index of the image for the button when mouse is over the item when ImageList is used.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.PressedImage
member.summary: Specifies the image for the button when mouse left button is pressed.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.PressedImageIndex
member.summary: Specifies the index of the image for the button when mouse left button is pressed and ImageList is used.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.DisabledImage
member.summary: Specifies the image for the button when items Enabled property is set to false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.DisabledImageIndex
member.summary: Specifies the index of the image for the button when items Enabled property is set to false and ImageList is used.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.ImageFixedSize
member.summary: Sets fixed size of the image. Image will be scaled and painted it size specified.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.FixedSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the fixed size of the button. Both width and height must be set to value greater than 0 in order for button to use fixed size. Setting both width and height to 0 (default value) indicates that button will be sized based on content.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.IsFadeEnabled
member.summary: Gets whether fade effect is enabled.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.IsPulseEnabed
member.summary: Gets whether Pulse function is enabled.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.IsPulsing
member.summary: Gets whether the button is currently pulsing, alternating slowly between the mouse over and default state.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.StopPulseOnMouseOver
member.summary: Gets or sets whether pulse effect started with StartPulse method stops automatically when mouse moves over the button. Default value is true.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.PulseSpeed
member.summary: Gets or sets the pulse speed. The value must be greater than 0 and less than 128. Higher values indicate faster pulse. Default value is 12.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.AutoExpandMenuItem
member.summary: Gets or sets whether button auto-expands on mouse hover when button is used as menu-item and displayed on menu. Default value is true.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.ShouldAutoExpandOnClick
member.summary: Indicates whether button should popup when clicked automatically.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.AutoCheckOnClick
member.summary: Gets or sets whether Checked property is automatically inverted, button checked/unchecked, when button is clicked. Default value is false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.Checked
member.summary: Gets or set a value indicating whether the button is in the checked state.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.AlternateShortCutText
member.summary: Gets or set the alternative shortcut text.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.DrawShortcutText
member.summary: Returns shortcut text if any that needs to be displayed.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.ImageDrawRect
member.summary: Gets or sets the image bounds.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.SubItemsRect
member.summary: Gets or sets sub items bounds.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.TextDrawRect
member.summary: Gets or sets text bounds.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.OptionGroup
member.summary: Gets or set the Group item belongs to. The groups allows a user to choose from mutually exclusive options within the group. The choice is reflected by Checked property.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.ForeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the text color of the button.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.HotForeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the text color of the button when mouse is over the item.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.HotFontUnderline
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the font used to draw the item text is underlined when mouse is over the item.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.HotFontBold
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the font used to draw the item text is bold when mouse is over the item.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.FontBold
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the font used to draw the item text is bold.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.FontItalic
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the font used to draw the item text is italic.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.FontUnderline
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the font used to draw the item text is underlined.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.SubItemsExpandWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the expand part of the button item.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.SubItems
member.summary: Returns the collection of sub items.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.SplitButton
member.summary: Gets or sets whether button appears as split button. Split button appearance divides button into two parts. Image which raises the click event when clicked and text and expand sign which shows button sub items on popup menu when clicked. Button must have both text and image visible (ButtonStyle property) in order to appear as a full split button. Use AutoExpandOnClick=true if you want to make complete surface of the button display popup when clicked.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text associated with this item.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.ImagePaddingHorizontal
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of padding added horizontally to the button images when not on menus. Default value is 10 pixels.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.ImagePaddingVertical
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of padding added vertically to the button images when not on menus. Default value is 6 pixels.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonItem.Shape
member.summary: Gets or sets an shape descriptor for the button which describes the shape of the button. Default value is null which indicates that system default shape is used.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonX.SplitButton
member.summary: Gets or sets whether button appears as split button. Split button appearance divides button into two parts. Image which raises the click event when clicked and text and expand sign which shows button sub items on popup menu when clicked. Button must have both text and image visible (ButtonStyle property) in order to appear as a full split button.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonX.EnableMnemonicWithAltKeyOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets whether mnemonic character assigned to button is processed only if Alt key is pressed. Default value is false which indicate that Alt key is not required.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonX.AutoExpandOnClick
member.summary: Indicates whether the button will auto-expand when clicked. When button contains sub-items, sub-items will be shown only if user click the expand part of the button. Setting this property to true will expand the button and show sub-items when user clicks anywhere inside of the button. Default value is false which indicates that button is expanded only if its expand part is clicked.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonX.AutoCheckOnClick
member.summary: Gets or sets whether Checked property is automatically inverted, button checked/unchecked, when button is clicked. Default value is false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonX.Checked
member.summary: Gets or set a value indicating whether the button is in the checked state.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonX.Shape
member.summary: Gets or sets an shape descriptor for the button which describes the shape of the button. Default value is null which indicates that system default shape is used.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonX.FocusCuesEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether control displays focus cues when focused.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonX.CustomColorName
member.summary: Gets or sets the custom color name. Name specified here must be represented by the corresponding object with the same name that is part of the Office2007ColorTable.ButtonItemColors collection. See documentation for Office2007ColorTable.ButtonItemColors for more information. If color table with specified name cannot be found default color will be used. Valid settings for this property override any setting to the Color property. Applies to items with Office 2007 style only.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonX.ColorTable
member.summary: Gets or sets the predefined color of the button. Color specified applies to buttons with Office 2007 style only. It does not have any effect on other styles. Default value is eButtonColor.Default

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonX.AutoSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is automatically resized to display its entire contents. You can set MaximumSize.Width property to set the maximum width used by the control.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonX.AutoSizeMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the mode by which the Button automatically resizes itself.

member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of spacing between button image if specified and text.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.ButtonX.Expanded
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the button is expanded (displays drop-down) or not.

member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of shortcut keys associated with the button. When shortcut key is pressed button Click event is raised.

member.name: M:DevComponents.DotNetBar.BaseItemControl.BeginUpdate
member.summary: Indicates to control that all further update operations should not result in layout and refresh of control content. Use this method to optimize the addition of new items to the control. This method supports nested calls meaning that multiple calls are allowed but they must be ended with appropriate number of EndUpdate calls. IsUpdateSuspended property returns whether update is suspended.

member.name: M:DevComponents.DotNetBar.BaseItemControl.EndUpdate
member.summary: Indicates that update operation is complete and that control should perform layout and refresh to show changes. See BeginUpdate for more details.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the BackColor value you set is used instead of the style back color automatically provided by the control. Default value is false which indicates that BackColor property is automatically managed. Set this property to true and then set BackColor property to make control use your custom back color.

member.summary: Disables internal drawing support for the List-box portion of Combo-box. Default value is false which means that internal drawing code is used. If you plan to provide your own drawing for combo box items you must set this property to True.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.ParentFieldNames
member.summary: Gets or sets comma separated field or property names that holds the value that is used to identify node and parent node. Format expected is: FieldNodeId,ParentNodeFieldId. For example if your table represents departments, you have DepartmentId field which uniquely identifies a department and ParentDepartmentId field which identifies parent of the department if any you would set this property to DepartmentId,ParentDepartmentId. Note that you can only use ParentFieldNames or GroupingMembers property but not both. If both are set ParentFieldName take precedence.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.GroupingMembers
member.summary: Gets or sets comma separated list of field or property names that are used for grouping when data-binding is used.

member.summary: Gets or sets style for automatically created group nodes when data-binding is used and GroupingMembers property is set.
member.value: Name of the style assigned or null value indicating that no style is used. Default value is null.

member.summary: Gets or sets the watermark text alignment. Default value is left.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether FocusHighlightColor is used as background color to highlight text box when it has input focus. Default value is false.

member.summary: Gets or sets the color used as background color to highlight text box when it has input focus and focus highlight is enabled.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.BackgroundStyle
member.summary: Specifies the background style of the control.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.ButtonDropDown
member.summary: Gets the object that describes the settings for the button that shows drop-down when clicked.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.ButtonClear
member.summary: Gets the object that describes the settings for the button that clears the content of the control when clicked.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.ButtonCustom
member.summary: Gets the object that describes the settings for the custom button that can execute an custom action of your choosing when clicked.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.ButtonCustom2
member.summary: Gets the object that describes the settings for the custom button that can execute an custom action of your choosing when clicked.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.EnterKeyTogglesPopup
member.summary: Indicates whether Enter key when pressed while control has input focus toggles the popup. Default value is true.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.KeyboardSearchEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether keyboard incremental search is enabled. Default value is true.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.KeyboardSearchNoSelectionAllowed
member.summary: Gets or sets whether during keyboard search selected node can be set to nothing/null if there is no match found. Default value is true.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.SearchBufferExpireTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the keyboard search buffer expiration timeout. Default value is 1000 which indicates that key pressed within 1 second will add to the search buffer and control will be searched for node text that begins with resulting string. Setting this value to 0 will disable the search buffer.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.PopupLocation
member.summary: Indicates the custom popup location for the ComboTree popup

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.DropDownControl
member.summary: Gets or sets the reference of the control that will be displayed on popup that is shown when drop-down button is clicked.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.DropDownItems
member.summary: Gets the collection of BaseItem derived items displayed on popup menu.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.AdvTree
member.summary: Gets the reference to internal AdvTree control that is displayed on popup Use it to get access to the AdvTree events and properties.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.DropDownHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the height in pixels of the drop-down portion of the ComboTreeBox control.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.DropDownWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width in pixels of the drop-down portion of the ComboTreeBox control.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.IsPopupOpen
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the combo box is displaying its drop-down portion.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.Nodes
member.summary: Gets the collection of tree nodes that are assigned to the popup tree view control.
member.value: A NodeCollection that represents the tree nodes assigned to the tree control.

remarks.para: The Nodes property holds a collection of Node objects, each of which has a Nodes property that can contain its own NodeCollection.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.Columns
member.summary: Gets the collection of column headers that appear in the popup tree.

remarks.para: By default there are no column headers defined. In that case tree control functions as regular tree control where text has unrestricted width.
If you want to restrict the horizontal width of the text but not display column header you can create one column and set its width to the width desired and set its Visible property to false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.ColumnsVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets whether column headers are visible if they are defined through Columns collection. Default value is true.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.GridColumnLines
member.summary: Gets or sets whether grid lines are displayed when columns are defined. Default value is true.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.GridLinesColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the grid lines color.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.GridRowLines
member.summary: Gets or sets whether horizontal grid lines between each row are displayed. Default value is false.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.HotTracking
member.summary: Gets or sets whether node is highlighted when mouse enters the node. Default value is false.
member.remarks: There are two ways to enable the node hot-tracking. You can set the HotTracking property to true in which case the mouse tracking is enabled using system colors specified in TreeColorTable. You can also define the NodeStyleMouseOver style which gets applied to the node when mouse is over the node.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.SelectionBoxStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the node selection box style for popup tree control.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.ImageList
member.summary: Gets or sets the ImageList that contains the Image objects used by the tree nodes.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.ImageIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the image-list index value of the default image that is displayed by the tree nodes.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.ComboTree.DisabledBackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the control background color when control is disabled. Default value is an empty color which indicates that system background color is used when control is disabled.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.DataGridViewButtonXColumn.AutoExpandOnClick
member.summary: Indicates whether the button will auto-expand when clicked. When button contains sub-items, sub-items will be shown only if user click the expand part of the button. Setting this property to true will expand the button and show sub-items when user clicks anywhere inside of the button. Default value is false which indicates that button is expanded only if its expand part is clicked.

member.summary: Gets or set a value indicating whether the button is in the checked state.

member.summary: Gets or sets button Color Scheme. ColorScheme does not apply to Office2007 styled buttons.

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.DataGridViewButtonXColumn.ColorTable
member.summary: Gets or sets the predefined color of the button. Color specified applies to buttons with Office 2007 style only. It does not have any effect on other styles. Default value is eButtonColor.BlueWithBackground

member.name: P:DevComponents.DotNetBar.Controls.DataGridViewButtonXColumn.CustomColorName
member.summary: Gets or sets the custom color name. Name specified here must be represented by the corresponding object with the same name that is part of the Office2007ColorTable.ButtonItemColors collection. See documentation for Office2007ColorTable.ButtonItemColors for more information. If color table with specified name cannot be found default color will be used. Valid settings for this property override any setting to the Color property. Applies to items with Office 2007 style only.

member.summary: Specifies the image for the button when items Enabled property is set to false.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether text-markup support is enabled for items Text property. Default value is true. Set this property to false to display HTML or other markup in the item instead of it being parsed as text-markup.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether button appears as split button. Split button appearance divides button into two parts. Image which raises the click event when clicked and text and expand sign which shows button sub items on popup menu when clicked. Button must have both text and image visible (ButtonStyle property) in order to appear as a full split button.
